Text: Why this movie doesnt have sound?Burn on dvdr and it has sound in the menu,but not in the movie.Neither the nero player has sound.

@tunamgu: Probably because whowever ripped this chose to keep the DTS audio track and remove the Dolby Digital audio track (to save space better used to retain the image quality).

When you're trying to watch the movie the player doesn't find a Dolby Digital track and thus is silent. Try and change the audio to DTS instead.
tried to change,but doesnt work.have you tried?
you dvd player is not supporting DTS sounds, so that's why it is silence :D you need home theatre system with digital amplifier :)
